title: Total U.S. hay production 2000 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Production in thousand tons. In total the number of data points it has is 20.
Overall Production in thousand tons has decreased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Production in thousand tons, of value 158122.0 was reached at Year 2004
The lowest Production in thousand tons, of value 117072.0 was reported at Year 2012
